title.jp: Only One ni Narenai Jan yo

synopsis: There's a Dandy in every universe, and Space Dandy is about to meet them all. He just needs to pull the nearest Cosmic String, and he'll find himself face-to-face with himself.

title.jp: Yami ni wa Yami no Neiro ga Aru Jan yo

synopsis: After a big fight with QT and Meow, Dandy is lured to the distant planet of an extremely rare, ukulele-playing alien that wants to turn him into a statue - and steal his smile forever!

title.jp: Isogabamawaru no ga Ore Jan yo

synopsis: Thanks to a nifty, handheld teleportation device, Dandy and Meow get mixed up with a fishy little alien whose planet is teetering on the brink of obliteration!

It’s a Space Dandy musical, baby, as school’s back in session for Dandy in this ‘80s skewering outing...

“Nobody puts Dandy in the corner.”

title.jp: Big Fish wa Dekkai Jan yo

synopsis: Dandy and the gang take up fishing in the hopes of capturing an extremely rare alien fish with a massive bounty, but to land this prized catch, they're gonna need a bigger boat!

title.jp: Uchuu no Shinshi wa Gentleman Jan yo

synopsis: When Dr. Gel kidnaps his favorite Boobies girl, Dandy joins forces with a suave and sophisticated alien in a dashing attempt to save the day and collect a big bounty!
Dandy and a new friend decide to start a legendary rock group, but it’s hard to write a hit song when you can stop arguing over band names and t-shirt designs!

title.jp: Kanashimi no Nai Sekai Jan yo

synopsis: When an unfortunate encounter with a dark nebula maroons Dandy on a mysterious planet populated by bizarre beings, the legendary bounty hunter scrambles to find his ticket out of limbo!

title.jp: Onaji Baka nara Odoranya Son Jan yo

synopsis: Dandy and his crew head to Planet Grease for a legendary party, only to find themselves walking the streets of a ghost town. Luckily, Dandy’s got the booty that launched a thousand dance parties!
Dandy’s dead broke, so he agrees to pose as Scarlett’s boyfriend in exchange for some cold hard cash. Does true love stand a chance when you’re paying your date?

title.jp: Jigen no Chigau Hanashi Jan yo

synopsis: Dandy must confront a painful memory from his past when a four-dimensional ex-girlfriend shows up looking for help avoiding the bounty hunter’s two-dimensional former rival!

title.jp: Sabakareru no wa Dandy Jan yo

synopsis: A seemingly-harmless trip to Boobies ends with Dandy on trial for the murder of a very rare alien. When his friends are called to testify, the situation goes from bad – to worse!
Dr. Gel finally captures Dandy, which sparks an ultra-destructive space war that could end the universe. Meanwhile, Honey and Scarlet team up with QT and Meow to save their favorite bounty hunter!
